mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Estate of Hugh Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This statement lists various items purchased from A. M. Carson for a total of $134.34. It is signed with marks beside their names by Rosa Lewis, Isabella Lewis, Mary Lewis, and Susan Lewis. It is attested and signed by D. J. Whipple and D. P. Curry.
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Invoice from A. M. Carson for Rosey, April 14, 1860
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Legacies
